name: Twitter Home Time line
author: Bhuwan kumar singh

sections.description: Twitter Home Time line, Displays latest tweets just like the home page after you login to twitter using twitteroauth
sections.installation:
1. Upload directory contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to settings -> Twitter Home Timeline Options before using this, you can get the api setting from twitter site after you login, use the link https://dev.twitter.com/apps
  4. Use sidebar widgets to show that in the sidebar
  5. Use the short code like [TwitterHomeTimeline title=’Latest Tweets’] show the latest tweets.
sections.faq: 1. Go to http://www.phpquestionsandanswers.com/forum/topic/twitter-home-time-line for any discussion, query, support etc.
sections.changelog: version 1.0 running successfully, please mail bhuwan81@gmail.com if you have any query
